channel.title: I'm in need of help with SCAR
channel.description:
This is the error I get on WhiteShadow's PowerChopper, and other scripts. I've extracted all of the includes to the includes folder, and all and such as said on the tut made by Star.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.Scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/Misc/PlayerForm.Scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
Could anyone tell me how to fix this and what I need to do..? :confused: Any help would be MOST appreciated.. Btw, I also tried running the Gull killer, and another power cutter, both of which ended up failing to compile like so ^^. So yeah just leave a post up here telling me what to do to get this fixed, if it can be, or w/e.
Thanks, Unforgiving

item.title: I'm in need of help with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @Percy Percy
item.description:
@Percy wrote:

Lol KyleGut3 man they r noobs i know it gets annoying but be nice otherwise the forum population will decrease rapidly =(…Anyway “Rawr Bitches” you havent installed SRL properly follow the turorial in SRL portal i think on how to setup SRL for autoing…have fun

Read full topic
item.source: I'm in need of help with SCAR

item.title: I'm in need of help with SCAR
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

[Sigh]… I swear I’ve posted on the same looking posts at least 10 times now.

Heres what you do, You INSTALL the SRL INCLUDE properly. SCAR, if you didnt notice, gives nice neat error reports. “Does not exist” hmmmm what does that mean?

Read full topic
item.source: I'm in need of help with SCAR
